name: Super Retro Rec League Racing
description:
Super Retro Rec League Racing is a single-player, time-attack style arcade racer. Inspired by high-speed open-wheel racing, players will need to perfect their lines, optimize every turn, remember to check their fuel, and have absolute control to dominate the tracks.

The game is simple, but navigating the tracks at high speed requires absolute focus, as a single slip up can shatter your shot at a new record.



The game features 6 unique tracks, plus a second set of remixed hot-lap variations.

The game is built on Unreal Engine 5, and supports both keyboard & controller.
